tool_input.old_string:
import DateTimePicker from "@react-native-community/datetimepicker";
import { startOfDay } from "date-fns";

## Mobile App (Expo)
- Clerk auth with expo-secure-store token cache
- tRPC client passes Bearer token in Authorization header
- Navigation: (auth) group + (app) group with (tabs)
- Design tokens match web: primary=#385968, secondary=#84A8A3, etc.
- See `MOBILE_APP_SPEC.md` for full progress tracking
tool_input.new_string:
## Mobile App (Expo)
- Clerk auth with expo-secure-store token cache
- tRPC client passes Bearer token in Authorization header
- Navigation: (auth) group + (app) group with (tabs)
- Design tokens match web: primary=#385968, secondary=#84A8A3, etc.
- See `MOBILE_APP_SPEC.md` for full progress tracking

## tRPC Procedure Names (mobile must match these)
- **flocks**: getFlocks, getFlock({flockId}), createFlock, updateFlock
- **logs**: getLogs({page}), getLogsByFlock({page,flockId}), createLog, deleteLog
- **expenses**: getExpenses({page}), createExpense, deleteExpense
- **stats**: getStats({flockId,range,today,breedFilter}), getExpenseStats({today,flockId,numMonths}), getFlockSummary, getBreedStats
- **breeds**: createBreed, updateBreed, deleteBreed (NO queries - breeds come from getFlock)
- **auth**: getSession, getUser, updateUser, setDefaultFlock, getUserNotifications, getUserUnreadNotifications, markNotificationasRead

## Mobile Components
- LogEggsModal: stepper +/- for count, date picker, breed chips, haptic feedback
- LogExpenseModal: currency input, category chips, date picker, haptic feedback
- AddFlockModal: name, description, type selector
- BreedFormModal: create/edit breed with image picker
- ProductionChart: bar chart with 7/15/30 day range selector
- ExpenseChart: stacked bar by category with 6/9/12 month selector
- Swipe-to-delete on logs and expenses lists
